mechanoreception.notes: Sensory capabilities related to detecting mechanical stimuli. Likely present for sensing water currents and prey, but requires further research.

chemoreception.notes: Sensory capabilities related to detecting chemical stimuli. Likely present for finding food and mates, but requires further research.

vision.notes: Presence and functionality of vision is unknown. Rotifers often have eyespots, but their capability for image formation is debated.
